data.name: TERA - White Winter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Lose yourself in the action-packed world of TERA and pick up a package containing a Frost Guards weapon skin and many more wintry items!


In this breathtaking MMORPG you need to take fate in your own hands, carefully aiming your attacks and dodging enemy spells in the dynamic True Action Combat system. Seven races, 13 classes and countless dungeons, battlegrounds and powerful bosses – TERA pushes the boundaries of the MMO genre!

You must install TERA and create a character before you can use this package.

The package contains:

1x Smart Box: Frost Guards Weapon Skin

This box contains a frosty cool skin for your weapon.

1x Smart Box: Snowsuit

This box contains a warm winter sports outfit for your character.

1x Riding Skill: Snowbite

Snowbite is a friendly snowman who you can summon to ride at any time. Enjoy a magical shower of snowflakes while you are mounted on him.

1x Cheerful Snow Cloud

This cloud floats above your head, showering you with a gentle flurry of snow.

1x Snowboard Goggles

A snazzy winter accessory for your snowbound adventures.

4x Strong Bravery Potion

Strong Bravery Potions increase your attack speed and skill damage for 30 minutes. They also reduce the damage your receive.

4x Strong Canephora Potion

Strong Canephora Potions increase your skill damage for 30 minutes.

2x Goddess’ Blessing

Use the Goddess’ Blessing to resurrect at the location of your death, should you die.

data.short_description: This package contains loads of great wintry items, including a frosty weapon skin, a snowsuit, a cool mount and loads more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 2130 / AMD FX 4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GT / Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX®: 9
  • Hard Drive: 45 GB HD space
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570 / AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 / Radeon HD 4890 1 GB
  • DirectX®: 9
  • Hard Drive: 55 GB HD space
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
